title: CISA Adds One Known Exploited Vulnerability to Catalog
summary: CISA has added one new vulnerability to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) Catalog , based on evidence of active exploitation. CVE(s) BeyondTrust Remote Support (RS) and Privileged Remote Access (PRA) OS Command Injection Vulnerability These types of vulnerabilities are frequent attack vectors for malicious cyber actors and pose significant risks to the federal enterprise.
